description: "The Airport Commission consists of five members appointed by the Mayor to four year terms. Originally part of the San Francisco Public Utilities Commission

description: "General City Responsibility is a departmental designation for expenditures that are citywide in nature. For example

description: "Hetch Hetchy is only one of nine reservoirs that comprise the San Francisco Public Utility Commission’s water system. Although Hetch Hetchy Reservoir is the most well-known
